arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: RB Leipzig vs. VfB Stuttgart
arts.sum: Here's how the teams line up for Leipzig and Stuttgart ahead of their Matchday 9 clash.

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig vs. VfB Stuttgart preview: Huge top-three clash at Red Bull Arena
arts.sum: Two of the Bundesliga's early-season pace-setters meet on Saturday, as RB Leipzig host VfB Stuttgart.

arts.ttl: Youthful exuberance and resilience as RB Leipzig host VfB Stuttgart
arts.sum: After difficult starts to the 2025/26 campaign, RB Leipzig and VfB Stuttgart are now flying high towards the Bundesliga’s summit, respectively in second and third as they prepare to meet on Matchday 9. Even including those six goals conceded at the hands of the Bavarians, they have the fourth-best defence in the division, while only Bayern, Bayer Leverkusen and Eintracht Frankfurt have found the net more often than Leipzig’s 16 times.
